name: Jhan the Duck
description:
Meet our friend Jhan in his adventures in the islands of this vast ocean trying to make his way through a lot of challenges and exciting moments!

---------------------------------------

Controls keyboard: 

  • W/A/S/D -> Movement
  • Up/Left/Down/Right arrow -> Camera Movement
  • Space -> Jump
  • E -> Shoot
  • Left-Shift -> Sprint
  • Esc -> Open menu

Controls Controller:

  • Left Joystick -> Movement
  • Right Joystick -> Camera Movement
  • South button -> Jump
  • East button -> Shoot
  • West button -> Sprint
  • Start -> Open menu

---------------------------------------

- Game in 72h for Mini Jam 108: Seaside Game Jam.

Game made by Alvaro Carbó, Marc Canals, Eric Elies and Sergi Bonell.

Models used in this project are from Kay Kit - Mini Game Variety Pack.
